name: Fairies vs. Darklings: Arcane Edition
description: Save the land of Titania from the devilish forces of darkness! Harvest mana from magical gemstones, summon magical Fairies and vanquish the evil Darklings before they plunge the whole world into oblivion!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or superior Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with DX 9 and Shader model 2.0 support. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is amazing! I something like match three with shift rpg combats!  Pros: - Beauty graphs - Nice music - Challenger - Addictive  Cons: Nothing so far
